actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for daylight saving time for the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually.

summary.text: Provides, under the Uniform Time Act of 1966, that daylight saving time shall be for the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide for daylight saving time for the period beginning May 31 through Labor Day annually.
